subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Defender Wilman Conde scored his first goal of the season, on a long shot to the upper-right corner in the 88th minute, as the Red Bulls rallied for a 2-2 tie with D.C. United.
snippet: Defender Wilman Conde scored his first goal of the season, on a long shot to the upper-right corner in the 88th minute, as the Red Bulls rallied for a 2-2 tie with D.C. United.
